image.title: World News Today, Trending World News, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: 'This needs to stop now': Bill Ackman slams Joe Biden's 'deep state' labour deals before Donald Trump takes office
item.description: Bill Ackman accuses President Biden of attempting to solidify the Deep State with long-term contracts before leaving office, making it challenging for Trump's team to succeed. The Biden administration’s deal with the SSA ensures telework protections for thousands of employees until 2029, while Trump’s team plans significant budget cuts and the elimination of work-from-home policies.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump's pick Chad Chronister withdraws from DEA nomination, cites commitment to local duties
item.description: Sheriff Chad Chronister from Hillsborough withdrew his candidacy for Administrator of the US Drug Enforcement Administration. He cited his commitment to local initiatives as the reason. The decision drew mixed reactions. Some praised his withdrawal while others criticized his past actions during the COVID-19 pandemic. Congressman Thomas Massie and commentator Liz Wheeler were among the critics.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Two dead after Tesla crashes into rock barrier and catches fire in New York
item.description: Two people died after a Tesla crashed into a rock barrier and caught fire in Pelham Manor, New York. The vehicle collided with the barrier around 9:15 am, leading to a fire exacerbated by the car's lithium-ion battery. The accident follows a similar recent crash involving a Tesla Cybertruck in California.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Obligation to protect its minority': US Congressman lawmaker calls for protection of Hindus in Bangladesh
item.description: US Congressman Brad Sherman stresses that Bangladesh's interim government must protect its Hindu minority and address their grievances amidst violent unrest. An urgent call for investigation by the UN highlights the concern. Protests continued near the White House, demanding freedom for Hindu monk Chinmoy Krishna Brahmachari, who faces life threats in custody.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Hunter Biden owes over $300,000 in unpaid rent, claims venture capitalist Shaun Maguire
item.description: After President Biden's pardon for his son Hunter, allegations about unpaid rent have resurfaced. Venture capitalist Shaun Maguire claims Hunter owes over $300,000 in back rent for a Venice, California property. Maguire said Hunter didn't pay rent and tried to compensate with his own feces artwork. The pardon doesn't cover civil issues like unpaid rent.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: No lawyer shows up for monk in B'desh court
item.dc:creator: Tamaghna Banerjee

item.title: Gladiator for a night at the Colosseum? Some Romans are up in arms
US President-elect Donald Trump’s legal team moves to dismiss hush money case
item.description: US President-elect Donald Trump's legal team has filed a motion seeking to dismiss his hush money conviction, arguing it disrupts presidential duties and undermines voters' mandate. The case involves 34 counts of falsifying business records related to a payment to Stormy Daniels. Trump's lawyers claim the prosecution is politically motivated and seek to delay sentencing until 2029.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: NYC mayor backs deportation of migrants, seeks collaboration with Trump admin
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams plans to deport migrants charged with crimes, changing his stance from awaiting convictions. Adams intends to work with the Trump administration to address public safety concerns, while still supporting law-abiding undocumented immigrants. This highlights a significant shift in the city’s immigration policy discourse.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Eminem’s mother passes away at 69 due to cancer
item.description: Debbie Nelson, the mother of rapper Eminem, has passed away at 69 from lung cancer complications. Nelson had a challenging life and a tumultuous relationship with Eminem, who later apologized publicly. Despite past conflicts, their bond improved over time, with Nelson expressing pride in Eminem's achievements.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: What did Nizam of Hyderabad gift as lavish wedding gift to Queen Elizabeth II?
item.description: In 1947, Princess Elizabeth received a stunning tiara and necklace from the Nizam of Hyderabad, crafted by Cartier and now valued at $88 million. The tiara, with detachable brooches, and the necklace adorned with diamonds, have become iconic royal pieces, currently worn by Queen Camilla following Queen Elizabeth II's passing.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Tripura breach: Dhaka summons Indian envoy
Namibia elects first female president, Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah
item.description: Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah has become Namibia's first female president, securing 57% of the vote and continuing the SWAPO party's 34-year rule. Her election signifies a momentous development in Namibian politics, despite challenges from the IPC, which plans to contest the election results, citing procedural issues.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Conspiracy theory behind Reid Hoffman considering leaving US is...; Elon Musk agrees
item.description: ​New York Times reported that Hoffman supported Kamala Harris and according to reports he told his friends that he was thinking of relocating to somewhere else because he thinks Trump would use his power to seek retribution against his political enemies. Conservative commentator Charlie Kirk asked on X why Reid Hoffman would flee the country if he did nothing wrong.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Watch: Asteroid nearly hits Earth, lights up Siberian sky before impact
item.description: A small asteroid, C0WEPC5, entered Earth's atmosphere and burned up over Siberia on December 4, 2024, producing a bright fireball. Detected just hours prior, it highlighted advancements in monitoring techniques. This marks the fourth imminent impactor detected this year, demonstrating improved observational capabilities.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: FAA investigates American Airlines flight after emergency return to Chicago
item.description: The FAA is investigating an American Airlines flight that returned to Chicago O'Hare due to a potential electrical issue detected by an indicator light, which was later found to be a false alarm. Passengers resumed their journey on a replacement aircraft. The incident adds to a series of recent issues faced by the airline.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: CNN compares South Korea martial law with Trump's Capitol riots, slammed
item.description: ​"Donald Trump is about to be the president. Somebody who has said he wants to use the military to go after his own enemies," CNN White House correspondent MJ Lee said as she explained that the pictures coming from Seoul are very emotionally jarring for the folks in South Korea.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Donald Trump Jr says as a father he understands Biden's pardon but...
item.description: "In his statement, Biden said the justice system has been infected by politics. Well, I agree..Biden thinks the DoJ was weaponized. It sounds like we have a bipartisan agreement on that. And we need Kash Patel in FBI to clean the house," Donald Trump Jr said as he also addressed the resistance Kash's nomination as the FBI director.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: When South Korean first lady got embroiled in Dior bag controversy
item.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol apologizes on national television for the controversies involving his wife, Kim Keon-hee. He admits she should have conducted herself more appropriately but clarifies that most allegations are exaggerated. Yoon rejects an investigation call but ensures a committee will oversee her official duties.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Did Elon Musk react with 'I love Canada' after Trump's 51st state suggestion to Trudeau?
item.description: Elon Musk's 'I love Canada' T-shirt sparked false claims about his support for making Canada the 51st state of the US. The speculation arose after a dinner where Donald Trump jokingly suggested to Justin Trudeau that Canada should become a US state if it cannot manage its economy without ripping off the US to the tune of $100 billion.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
